analysis.key_quote: Thus the proposed movement to schedule policy/career will perniciously undermine the intent of Executive Order 14171 by creating conditions which de facto reinforce the conditions that lead to the issuance of the Executive Order.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about its impact on unbiased advice, employee motivation, and the overall effectiveness of the civil service system, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
